name.japanese: 麦わらの一味冒険日誌

description: A journal documenting the Straw Hat Pirates' adventures and experiences together. Brook discovers and reads this journal, which triggers his feelings of inadequacy as the newest member.
significance: Serves as a catalyst for Brook's emotional journey in this episode, representing the depth of shared history among the crew.

name.japanese: ブルックのバイオリン

description: Brook's violin, which he uses to perform Bink's Sake for the crew. The instrument represents his role as the crew's musician and his connection to his past.
significance: Symbolizes Brook finding his true role in the crew through music, bridging his past with the Rumbar Pirates and his present with the Straw Hats.
